name: FreshPow
0:
”Alexa, ask Fresh Pow for the Crystal Mountain overview.”
”Alexa, ask Fresh Pow for the Summit text report.”
”Alexa, open Fresh Pow and get me the conditions at Alpental.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fresh pow
des:
Requirements: Amazon account, Amazon Echo device
FreshPow will retrieve the text report, mountain overview, and conditions for the ski areas of the Summit at Snoqualmie, including Alpental and Summit West/Central, and Crystal Mountain. When using the skill, please refer to either 'Alpental', 'the Summit', or 'Crystal Mountain' when requesting a text report or conditions; you can also ask for an overview of the two areas ('the Summit at Snoqualmie' and 'Crystal Mountain') by requesting the 'Summit overview' or 'Crystal overview'.
You can say things like:
"What are the conditions at the Summit?"
"What is the weather at Crystal?"
"Fetch me the Alpental text report."
"Get me the Summit overview."
"Grab me the Alpental conditions."
"What is the Summit text report?"
"Grab me the Summit at Snoqualmie lift report."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
